definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
see 冬蟲夏草|冬虫夏草[dong1 chong2 xia4 cao3]

sentences.english: All summer, my goal HAS BEEN to catch a firefly. ---How do you translate HAS BEEN?
sentences.chinese: 整個夏天，我的目的就是捉到一隻熒火蟲。

sentences.english: Looks a bit like a worm so we call them space-time worms.
sentences.chinese: 看起來有點像蟲子，所以我們稱爲時空蟲。

sentences.english: In contrast, during the Famennian the radiolarian fauna was well developed and diversified.
sentences.chinese: 相反，放射蟲動物羣在法門期得到了重大發展。

sentences.english: Sunlit waterfall spray tumbles into our boat and a chorus of various insects rings in our ears.
sentences.chinese: 陽光下的瀑布水花灑落進小船，蟲鳴聲不絕於耳。

sentences.english: An investigation on the scale insects on ornamental plants was conducted in Huaibei city, Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 對淮北市園林植物蚧蟲種類進行了調查研究。

sentences.english: Dead mealworms also suit their tastes.
sentences.chinese: 牠們也很喜歡喫死掉的麪包蟲。

sentences.english: The small round blue organisms at the lumenal border are cryptosporidia.
sentences.chinese: 在內腔邊界的小圓蘭色的生物體是隱孢子蟲。

sentences.english: Any of various similar arthropod animals, such as spiders, centipedes, or ticks.
sentences.chinese: 蟲各種類似的節肢類動物，如蜘蛛，百足。

sentences.english: His likes eating some bread worms.
His early life path became as twisted as the notorious mescal worm.
sentences.chinese: 他的早年生活變得跟惡名昭彰的龍舌蘭蟲一樣瘋狂？

sentences.english: Tadpole shrimp live in seasonal, freshwater ponds.
sentences.chinese: 鱟蟲生活在季節性活水池塘中。

sentences.english: The doctor quickly and very carefully picked them up one by one with tweezers.
sentences.chinese: 醫師就很小心用鑷子，把那些蟲一隻一隻的夾起來。

sentences.english: A preliminary survey of the scale insects on the plants and flowers of the gardens was made in 1981-1983 in Beijing district.
sentences.chinese: 本文對北京地區園林植物介殼蟲種類進行了調查研究。

sentences.english: Peter learned to turn himself into a rat and used the nickname "Wormtail."
sentences.chinese: 彼德學習變成一個老鼠並使用蟲尾巴這個外號。

sentences.english: It still needs more attention and studies to the biodiversities of microsporidia.
sentences.chinese: 在微孢子蟲多樣性的研究需要更多的注意及研究。

sentences.english: “But be careful not to swallow the head of the worm,” he adds.
sentences.chinese: “但小心可別喫掉樹蟲的頭，”他接着說。

definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
